text: Maria Schneider (born Marie Christine GÃ©lin, Paris, 27 March 1952 - 3 February 2011) was a French actress. She was in many movies. She played Jeanne in the 1972 erotic movie Last Tango in Paris opposite Marlon Brando. Schneider died in Paris from cancer at age fifty-eight. == References == Category:Actors from Paris Category:French movie actors Category:1952 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:French television actors Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:Bisexual people
